headline: Schlumberger (SLB) Drops 5.89% on Israel-Iran Ceasefire
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the These 10 Stocks Took A Shocking Fall. Schlumberger dropped for a third consecutive day on Monday, losing 5.89 percent to close at $33.73 apiece following stabilizing oil prices, thanks to the ceasefire between Israel and Iran. headline: Citi outlines what awaits the biggest U.S. oilfield services providers in H2
summary: Investing.com - Questions have been swirling around whether the largest U.S. providers of oil and gas equipment and services will slash their second-half financial outlooks, according to analysts at Citigroup (NYSE:C).
